title: Evelynn ulti
body:
As we know eve ulti does more damage to champs under 30% hp.  Can we get an update so the healthbars have indicators of when the opponents are at 30%..
{{champion:31}}  and {{champion:555}}  have these indicators...
Yes could be cause those are true executes but for abilities that rely on health percentage i think could use an indicator..
Im sure its happened alot and in one my recent games i ulted {{champion:21}}  as {{champion:28}}  and it didnt kill  i did math after the game she was at 763 when i ulted she was 13 hp from 30%    
and as for my items {{item:3152}}  {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}}  {{item:3135}} {{item:1052}}  wasnt at full build  but was more than enough to deal 90% of that hp left  without the less than 30% ult boost

So  can we get a future update to have some sort of indicator on champs with health bar % skills  it would help all players out alot
  
Thanks
